org.fridlund.backman.scenes

Class MainMenuScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fridlund.javalabra.game.scenes.Scene
      • org.fridlund.javalabra.game.scenes.MenuScene
        • org.fridlund.backman.scenes.MainMenuScene

  • public class MainMenuScene
extends org.fridlund.javalabra.game.scenes.MenuScene
    Main menu, contains buttons and eventual graphics related to the menu. It's from here the game is started.
